summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to proceed with preliminary engineering activities including community involvement leading to the design and construction of street improvements to Meridian Avenue North between North 115th Street and Northeast Northgate Way; not limited to increasing expenditure allowance in the 1989 Budget of the Engineering Department by a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Department Operating Fund and making an appropriation from the Transportation Improvement Fund.
